about_the_game:
The Palia Original Soundtrack features 24 tracks of cozy music ready to welcome you home to Palia. Music composed by Steffen Schmidt.

The album features music heard all throughout the journey in Palia, from the valleys of Kilima Village to the peaks of Bahari Bay to the warm welcome of coming back to your home plot. The score was recorded by extraordinary orchestras at legendary stages including Synchron Stage Vienna and Abbey Road Studios.
